name: Ashborn (Csécs Norbert...)
description:
Ashborn will be an Action-Adventure game set in an enchanting Fantasy world. The game's progression is to be centered around The Ashborn Crisis and how the Player's team of adventurers can help their village survive it and thrive. This title is being developed by Fireslug Studios Ltd. on the Unity Engine, with the Second Combat Demo (0.1.2.p) out already!

Due to some hosting issues Ashborn currently cannot be downloaded from this page, please go to http://www.fireslugstudios.com/?page_id=355 instead to download and play the demo.

I am working as an Executive Producer on the Ashborn Project, with a very diverse set of responsibilities, ranging from ensuring smooth day-to-day operations, working on social media promotions, scheduling, budgeting, communicating with partners and more. 

The full credits of the 50+ volunteer contributors, including myself, can be found and read in the Combat Demo.
